      Offset Offset.setFirst(long first)
      actual offset, which could be measured in bytes, chars, or lines.
      Offset Offset.setLength(int length) 
      Offset Offset.setType(OffsetType type)
      see comments on OffsetType
      Offset Offset.setValue(byte[] value)
      bytes specified by this offset extracted from the original; just to assist in debugging
      Offset Offset.setValue(java.nio.ByteBuffer value) 
      Offset Offset.setXpath(java.lang.String xpath)
      if xpath is not empty, then annotation applies to an offset within data that starts with an XPATH query into XHTML or XML
